name: Tale of the Seas
description: It is a classic gem elimination game, a gem exchange elimination game that exercises eyesight. The game screen will display various gemstones of different colors. The rule of the game is to exchange two adjacent gemstones, so that three gemstones of the same color are connected together to eliminate the gemstones. The screen is very exquisite, with elements made of very shiny diamonds and gemstones. Each level is meticulously crafted, and this game will bring you a different leisure and relaxation experience. It can be said that it is a classic work of elimination games. Although it looks very ordinary and simple, it fully reflects the simple fun that elimination games bring to players. This classic game has high playability, allowing players to play in regular mode or time limited modes with a more intense pace.
